author: hroskes
body:
This code is to make plots for the cosmic track splitting validation, as is done by several other validations in the All In One Tool. I was asked by the alignment conveners to create this pull request in several release cycles.

Backport of pull request #5081 in 72X

Equivalent pull requests in other releases:
72X #5081 
71X #5091 
70X #5092 
53X #5093
title: Make plots for the cosmic track splitting validation
